Poem #3 by: Zack F
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Poem #3 by: Zack F
By Raine on Tuesday, April 18, 2000 - 02:07 pm:

Lively monster
Small and quick
Jumpity guy
Who's kind of thick
Wide eyed one
Who digs for things
I have one use:
To get the springs
Guess what monster this poem is about!
